content: cc lines then w ith out and wrap the hair elastic around the elastic a tapestry needle go through both legs of the first cc st fr om around it right to left 4 do the same through the cc 5 go back to the side where 6 do the same on the oppo site st on the opposite side of the you started and go into the side of the seam seam next st mc from right to left i would love to see your scrunchies you can share it on ig by tagging me @made_in_lea s and using the hashtag #leftovercheckeredscrunchie and/or put your project on ravelry all rights reserved this pattern is for private use only and may not be copied re-sold or shared by downloading or printing this this is how your seam should pattern you have accepted these terms and conditions look like after you have sewn a few sts together madeinlea s ã copyright 2025
